tool_description: Welcome to The AOL On Network’s API developer documentation. It enables you to integrate our video content, display and functionality into your website.
name: AOL On Network
title: AOL On Network

api_list.name: Single/Multiple Video
api_list.description: To access the data for a specific video, you simply request a URL from Aol On Network's API with the specific video ID you want.

required_parameters.name: Video_Group_Id
required_parameters.description: Id of video group you want to get.

required_parameters.name: video_id
required_parameters.description: Can be retrieved from the end of the video URL.

required_parameters.name: format
required_parameters.description: Xml or Json (Not all json calls are supported)

optional_parameters.name: num_related_return
optional_parameters.description: Number of related videos to return per video

optional_parameters.name: page
optional_parameters.description: Which page of results to display

optional_parameters.name: return_category_id
optional_parameters.description: Add ID of category per video

optional_parameters.name: show_renditions
optional_parameters.description: Show all available renditions for the video

optional_parameters.name: thumbnail_sizes
optional_parameters.description: Include/exclude thumbnails sizes extracted for video

api_list.name: Searching for videos
api_list.description: You can search our library using this request:

required_parameters.name: sort
required_parameters.description: most_viewed / top_rated / most_discussed / most_favorited / most_recent / featured / relevance / approval_date

required_parameters.name: search_term
required_parameters.description: The search_term can either be free text, or 3 words separated by spaces for density search.
